Class JaCaActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      jaca.android.dev.JaCaActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
IJaCaActivity
public class JaCaActivity
extends Activity
implements IJaCaActivity

Developers must extend this class to define a standard Android Activity linked to a specialisation of a CArtAgO GUIArtifact

Author:
mguidi
